description: A front-end to xinit that provides a nice user interface for running a single session of the X Window System. More information: https://x.org/releases/X11R7.5/doc/man/man1/startx.1.html.

useCases.description: Start an X session with a predefined depth value:
Start an X session with a predefined dpi value:
Override the settings in the .xinitrc file and start a new X session:
